definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: The collection of different antibody specificities expressed in an individual.
sentences.chinese: 是表达在一个体内特异性不同的抗体的总和。

sentences.english: The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4cm.
sentences.chinese: 若出现空洞，其直径总和小于4厘米。

sentences.english: Good way so you don't lose track of it and it will be always with you.
sentences.chinese: 这样就不会找不到座骑了，坐骑也总和你在一起。

sentences.english: For better and for worst, and Bill and I together.
sentences.chinese: 不论是好的还是坏的，比尔总和我一起。

sentences.english: If I write Fibonacci, you see it right there.
sentences.chinese: 也就是前两个月的总和。

sentences.english: But why do total assets equal the total of liabilities and owner's equity ?
sentences.chinese: 但是为什么资产总额等于负债加业主权益的总和呢？

sentences.english: Conceptually, they are bundles of properties.
sentences.chinese: 从概念上说，它们是属性的总和。

sentences.english: We are convinced that the team's results are far greater than the sum of individual efforts.
sentences.chinese: 我们深信，团队协作的成果远远大于个人努力的总和。

sentences.english: Results The VEPBS of amblyopia children is lower than that of normal children group.
sentences.chinese: 结果弱视儿童组的双眼总和低于正常组。

sentences.english: Set up the white noise signal to the regulator sum of points through the software.
sentences.chinese: 成立白噪声信号，经过软件调理点的总和。

sentences.english: In plain English: the system's processors can not be over-subscribed by the total of the entitlements.
sentences.chinese: 直白地说，标称值的总和不能超过系统的处理器数量。

sentences.english: All these figures add up to 5,050.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些数字加起来总和为5，050。

sentences.english: Sentence system is the total sentence samples in a language.
sentences.chinese: 句系是语言中句样的总和。

sentences.english: No, it's a bundle of properties.

definition: sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
